snippet.title: Project Warlock II - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on STEAM: https://cutt.ly/CTYuLke
Wishlist on GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/project_warlock_2
Project Warlock II Twitter: https://twitter.com/project_warlock

Project Warlock II is a retro shooter with non-stop action, blood-spattered pixels flying everywhere, epic rock and synth soundtrack, totally revamped sound design and is improving upon every aspect of the original game. Project Warlock II is looking at Quake and Unreal where Project Warlock’s eye was on Blood and Hexen.

Retrovibe is a channel where not only you’ll be able to watch the developers while live deving, but also is a place where you’ll fulfill your wildest neo-retro dreams. If you are looking for a new retro games or you are interested in developing your game, you will find interesting things here. Drop off comfortably and let the Retrovibe carry you away.

Follow and wishlist our other games:
B.I.O.T.A. - https://cutt.ly/vTYe716
Janosik 2 - https://cutt.ly/tTYeSG0
The Looter - https://cutt.ly/6TYiFCu
Project Warlock - https://cutt.ly/cTYuyQW
Shardpunk: Verminfall - https://cutt.ly/2TYigDQ

NEW GAMES, RETRO FEEL

Discover more videos on our channel, subscribe, and join our Discord: https://discord.gg/ensxn8yTvd 

#Retrovibe #Retro #Games #Gamedevelopment #Developers #Newretro #NewGames #RetroFeel
